p: Acidic polysaccharides are another category of active phytochemicals of jujube fruit with immunostimulatory properties. These effects were evident from the increased indices of main lymphatic organs, i.e. spleen and thymus in animals, showing an improved proliferation of immune cells. Additionally, these polysaccharides contain a series of metal ions which possibly participate in biological activities ( Zou etÂ al., 2018).
